item.title: Retevis RA685 Type C Port Fix
item.description: Intro So I bought this radio, with type-c port for charging, expecting it to work as normal and fine. But the type c port on Retevis RA685 does not work with type-c to type-c cables. So I had to diagnose the issue, learn how to fix it and buy some tools to getthe job done. Here is how I did it. The Problem The problem with the port is that it is only connected to VCC and Ground.
